name: Badminton Star
description:
Be the world badminton champion in this game!
Experience the Badminton World Championships in your phone! Real live combat mode, exercise your eyesight and ability to respond.
Smash your opponents off the court in this fun new badminton game!

Badminton Club features:
☆ Over 10 interesting roles
☆ More than 20 item attributes
☆ Over 10 coolest character skills
☆ 4 major scenes, beautiful visuals
☆ Smooth animations,awesome vivid sound
☆ Constant game updates!

Badminton never ceases to amaze!

The game belongs to Shenzhen QiXunXinYou Technology Co.,Ltd.
Enjoysports belongs to Shenzhen QiXunXinYou Technology Co.,Ltd.
